title: Eve Outdoor Cam brings HomeKit Secure Video to outdoor floodlights for the first time
content:
Eve’s HomeKit products have been some of my favorites for many years. Between products like the Eve Water Guard and the popular Thread enabled , its commitment to HomeKit has made it a fan favorite for people building a smart home around HomeKit. Today, Eve brings the Eve Outdoor Cam to the market with the first-ever floodlight with HomeKit Secure Video support.

more…

The post Eve Outdoor Cam brings HomeKit Secure Video to outdoor floodlights for the first time appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Eve Outdoor Cam is the first HomeKit Secure Video product that doubles as a floodlight for outdoor security and recording.
